definition: A regular payment received by individuals after a certain age or upon retirement, typically provided by the government or a pension fund. It is commonly used to refer to the financial support received by retired individuals to cover their living expenses.

examples.english: The pension is paid out monthly.

examples.german: Meine Großeltern beziehen eine hohe Rente.
examples.english: My grandparents receive a high pension.

examples.german: Die Rente wird automatisch auf das Bankkonto überwiesen.
examples.english: The pension is automatically transferred to the bank account.

examples.german: Die Rente wird ab dem 67. Lebensjahr ausgezahlt.
examples.english: The pension is paid out from the age of 67.
